definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: WCCC can free the students from the puzzle of examination-education and can also make the students get ideal results in exams.
sentences.chinese: 摆脱应试教育的困扰，而又能在考试中考出理想成绩。

sentences.english: So, our country decide to change exam-oriented education to quality education.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我国决定把应试教育转向素质教育。

sentences.english: Examination-oriented education has great influence because it has formed a system.
sentences.chinese: 应试教育因其体制化而产生巨大影响。

sentences.english: It will reform the exam-oriented educational mode, and widely practice quality-oriented education.
sentences.chinese: 改革应试教育模式，全面实施素质教育。

sentences.english: That's because the examination system does not allow independent thinking, " he told local media.
sentences.chinese: 原因就在于应试教育不允许学生独立思考。

sentences.english: Chin's current educational system is still exam-oriented education.
sentences.chinese: 中国目前的教育制度依然是应试教育。

sentences.english: Examination-oriented education suppresses students' nature and alienates students' sense of happiness.
sentences.chinese: 应试教育压抑了学生的天性，异化了学生的幸福感。

sentences.english: The secondary normal school students are failures under the all education for exam appraise system now.
sentences.chinese: 中师生在现行的应试教育的评价体系中是失败者。

sentences.english: Primary and Secondary Education should transform from exam-oriented education to quality-oriented education.
sentences.chinese: 中小学要实现由应试教育向素质教育的转轨。

sentences.english: Among these reasons, examination-oriented education system plays a vital role.
sentences.chinese: 其中，应试教育体制起着至关重要的作用。

definition: all-round education (contrasted with 應試教育|应试教育[ying4 shi4 jiao4 yu4], exam-oriented education)
high in score but low in ability (as a result of teaching to the test)
to enter the next grade school
abbr. for mathematics 數學|数学[shu4 xue2], physics 物理[wu4 li3] and chemistry 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO)/abbr. for 國際奧林匹克數學競賽|国际奥林匹克数学竞赛[Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Shu4 xue2 Jing4 sai4]

college entrance exam (especially as abbr. for 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試|普通高等学校招生全国统一考试[Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4])/(Tw) entrance exam for senior government service posts (abbr. for 公務人員高等考試|公务人员高等考试)
